creator: jnagel@fim-ag.de
text:
When I add the mod_jk.conf-auto entry to the httpd.conf of Apache 2.0.16, and 
try to start the server, I get the following error message:

Cannot load /usr/local/apache2/libexec/mod_jk.so into server:
/usr/local/apache2/libexec/mod_jk.so: undefined symbol: ap_table_get

It's a build problem, Apache2 + mod_jk building is still in work ( as long as 
Apache2 is not released ). The symbol should be available ( unless they changed 
the name of the method - again ). Henri is working on apache2+tomcat for 3.3.
( fixing it in 3.2.x is very unlikely )
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
